rootCause: A zero-day vulnerability in Internet Explorer was used in a phishing attack to gain access to corporate networks.
impact: Theft of intellectual property from dozens of major tech companies and attempts to access the Gmail accounts of Chinese human rights activists.
description: Dubbed 'Operation Aurora', this was a series of highly sophisticated and coordinated cyberattacks from China. Google's public disclosure of the attacks and their threat to cease operations in China marked a turning point in how corporations and governments discussed state-sponsored cyber espionage.
